title: Enchantment
description: Teddy O'Malley is a hip 16 year old in the beginning of her junior year at a Virginia Beach high school. Teddy's life gets flipped upside down when her mom gets orders to move to London. While packing she finds a letter about her absent father. Teddy's father is a Fairy. Not just any Fairy, he’s Paxton, the King of Iridesia.Which means she is half…fairy! In disbelief and shock, her last night in the states she makes a wish on a shooting star to find the answers she seeks. And maybe, just maybe her dad too. Teddy’s wish is answered by a fairy named Flynn. But is she ready for the adventure Flynn has up his whimsical sleeve? And will he really help Teddy or is she in trouble by befriending an enemy of her unknown father?
author: K.B. Miller
